channel.title: Oldrs - Most advanced Remake to date
channel.description:
Missing the good ole' days of runescape? Log on and relive your adventure! With a 10x XP rate you wont have to grind! (as much ;) )
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif[/img][url=http://]Webclient[/url] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/o8dts5.png[/img][url=http://] Download Client[/url] [img]http://i380.photobucket.com/albums/oo245/zamorak_album_2008/vote.gif[/img] [url=http://]Website[/url]
This server strives to be an exact replica of runescape from May 2006 (rev.377) Features!
Agility:
- Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable - Force movement mask - Run energy affected by weight and level
Prayer:
- All bones bury-able - Every prayer working properly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate - Zombie Random
Firemaking:
- Correct anims - Ashes - All logs lightable - Colored fires - "Backward" fire-lighting - Can't light fires in banks/duel arena
Woodcutting:
- Stumps and regrowing trees - Correct hatchet finding - Correct hatchet animations - All trees cut-able - Correct fell chance algorithms - Birds nest falling out - Broken axe and Flying head random event - Spirit Tree and Ent Tree random
Mining:
- Emptying and refilling rocks - All ores can be mined - Correct pickaxe finding and animations - Prospecting - Random chance of obtaining gems - Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms - Mining gems at shilo village - Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg) - Broken pickaxe and Flying head random event - Rock Golem and Bubbling Rocks random
Fletching:
- All logs can be fletched - Arrow, bow, and string making - Fletch 5, 10, x, all
Crafting:
- Gem cutting - Tanning - Spinning & Picking flax - Pottery - Jewelry (Gem, Silver, and Gold) Molding - Tanning - Weaving
Thieving:
- Stall Thieving - NPC Thieving - Aggressive Guards - Thieving chests
Cooking:
- All fishes cookable - All meat cookable - Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews. - Cooking gauntlets - Correct anims & delays - Working interface with multiple amount options - Lumbridge cooking range bonus - All foods and potions
Runecrafting:
- Altar Entering - Tiaras - Talisman-pointing - Abyss
Herblore:
- All potions makeable - Itentifying herbs - Weapon poisioning - Coconut
Smithing:
- All bars smithable - Smelting - Limestone - Correct anims, working interfaces & objects
Fishing:
- All fish can be caught - Big net fishing - Correct item requirements - Fishing spots located all around the world - Big fish and Fish troll random
Farming:
- All farming locations - Every seed plantable - Tool leprechaun - Farming master - Seeds grow even when your offline
Slayer:
- All Slayer masters - Slayer tasks based on combat level - Slayer tower - Use items to finish off monsters
Combat:
- PvP fully complete - PvN fully complete - X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death) - Perfect max hit formulas - Perfect accuracy formula - Every weapon special attack - Equipment effects (i.e. barrows) - Equipment requirements - Degradable equipment - Weapon poisoning - Flawless following
Bosses:
- TzTok-Jad - Big Wolf - Dagganoth Supreme - Dagganoth Rex - Dagganoth Prime - Chaos Elemental - Kalphite Queen - King Black Dragon
Minigames:
- Duel Arena - Castle Wars - Fight Caves - Fight Pits - Barrows - Burthrope games room - Champions challenge - Mage training arena - Gnome ball
Random Events:
- Broken/Flying axe random - Broken/Flying pickaxeaxe random - Bird Nests - Sand which Lady - Drunken dwarf - Genie - Rick - Jekyll - Rock Golem - Bubbling rocks - Spirit Tree - Zombie - Shade - Evil Chicken - River Troll - Big Fish - Whirlwind
Quests:
- Cook's Assistant - Doric's Quest - Imp Catchter - Pirates treasure - Restless Ghost - Rune Mysteries - Sheep Shearer - Witch's Potion - Tutorial Island
Miscellaneous:
- Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources) - Pickables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.) - Skill interfaces - Pets - Working objects all around the world - 2500 + npcs spawned - Christmas Crackers - Holiday events handler - Working desert - Single and double doors - RS Guilds - All original Shops - Sailing - Gnome Glider - Magic Carpet - Bank Pins - Correct runescape teleports - Wilderness warning - All rings/amulets effects - Al kharid/shantay pass w/dialogues & items req - Tele-other - Lots of minigames - Clipping following/npcs - Empty handler added for items that can be emptied - Crystal Chest - Flour Mill - RS prices - Chat filtering - Running/w energy - Skill Guides - Music/Sounds
Media (Caution: Pics below may cause uncontrollable nostalgia fever):
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PnVkP2C.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/tycRnLV.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/xXbngY0.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/BkGRa3T.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5RGwwUz.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Guuhoj3.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5UdG52n.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/9BML4g8.png[/img]
[img]http://i.minus.com/iScsDVCyUuchh.png[/img]
[img]http://i.minus.com/j8G9vPWyYBDXQ.png[/img]

@OldRss wrote:

Missing the good ole’ days of runescape? Log on and relive your adventure!
With a 10x XP rate you wont have to grind! (as much )

Webclient
Download Client
Website

This server strives to be an exact replica of runescape from May 2006 (rev.377)
Features!

Agility:

  • Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable
  • Force movement mask
  • Run energy affected by weight and level

Prayer:

  • Every prayer working properly
  • Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
  • Zombie Random

  • All logs lightable

Woodcutting:

  • Correct fell chance algorithms
  • Birds nest falling out
  • Broken axe and Flying head random event

  • Correct pickaxe finding and animations
  • Prospecting
  • Random chance of obtaining gems

  • Broken pickaxe and Flying head random event

Fletching:

  • Arrow, bow, and string making
  • Fletch 5, 10, x, all

  • Working interface with multiple amount options

Runecrafting:

  • Tiaras

  • Abyss

Herblore:

  • Itentifying herbs
  • Weapon poisioning

Smithing:

  • All bars smithable
  • Smelting
  • Limestone
  • Correct anims, working interfaces & objects

Fishing:

  • Fishing spots located all around the world

Farming:

  • All farming locations

Slayer:

  • Slayer tasks based on combat level

Combat:

  • PvP fully complete
  • PvN fully complete
  • X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death)
  • Perfect max hit formulas
  • Perfect accuracy formula
  • Every weapon special attack

  • Equipment requirements
  • Degradable equipment
  • Weapon poisoning

Bosses:
